definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: And after two years Malawi became a food donor to neighbouring countries.
sentences.chinese: 兩年後，馬拉維成爲了鄰國的食品捐助國。

sentences.english: “In Malawi, there are only 17 nurses for every 100 000 people,” she says.
sentences.chinese: “在馬拉維，每10萬人只有17名護士，”她說。

sentences.english: The United States Government continues to stand by Malawians in their time of need.
sentences.chinese: 美國政府會繼續在馬拉維人民有需要的時候伸出援手。

sentences.english: Malawi has launched a testing center for humanitarian drones.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉維已經建立了一家人道主義無人機測試中心。

definition: Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)
